definition: a slip of a pen/CL:處|处[chu4]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
mistake/error/to miss/to harm/to delay/to neglect/mistakenly

sentences.english: In a hurry I write the word dog instead of god,It was just a slip of the pen.
sentences.chinese: 一着急我把dog寫成god了，這只是筆誤罷了。

sentences.english: I tried my best. There could still be some typos .
sentences.chinese: 我盡力了，可能還會有一些筆誤。
